Package controller

Class StatisticsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.StatisticsController
  • public class StatisticsController
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that handles the statistics view and logic. The class fetches the scores from the SQL database, and calculates the averages, then it prints the results.

      • calculateAndPrintAverages

        private void calculateAndPrintAverages​(double[] humanScoreSumByMapId,
                                       int[] humanNumOfGamesByMapId,
                                       double[] machineScoreSumByMapId,
                                       int[] machineNumOfGamesByMapId,
                                       double[] studentsScoreSumByMapId,
                                       int[] studentsNumOfGamesByMapId)
        Calculates the average scores between our sum of scores and another students sum of scores, then prints the results to the text area
        Parameters:
        humanScoreSumByMapId - Our sum of scores
        humanNumOfGamesByMapId - Our number of games
        machineScoreSumByMapId - Our machine scores
        machineNumOfGamesByMapId - Our machine Number of games
        studentsScoreSumByMapId - Another students scores
        studentsNumOfGamesByMapId - Another students number of games
